knimeNode.name: Inductive Miner (Table)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node Inductive Miner discovers a process tree from an event table.

fullDescription.intro: This node accepts an event table to generate a process tree. Process tree is a block-structured process model, where the (inner) nodes are operators such as sequence, and choice, while leaves are activities. With process tree, it guarantees the soundness of process model. This node output process tree as output. Later, the process tree can be converted into Petri net.
fullDescription.option: The classifier chosen to classify the event log.
One Inductive Miner variant is chosen to mine a process model. There are different variants to cope with different event table types.

Noise threshold is used to filter the event table. If we choose one method with noise filter, this options shows up. When the Inductive Miner Variant is Inductive Miner, the noise threshold turns gray.
